about_the_game:
Inspired by the ambiance of Japanese shrines and Buddhist temple surroundings, this set is designed for the "Living Good City." It's perfect for crafting horror and adventure games set in serene shrine and temple environments.

Comprising tiles A5 and B, this set also provides scene patterns for "day, evening, and night," allowing you to dynamically convey the progression of time. Unleash your creativity by crafting unique scenarios and witness diverse effects!

For an expanded worldview, seamlessly integrate this set with the previous "SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset." Moreover, it's versatile—you can utilize this set independently, even without the "SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset."
Enjoy the flexibility to shape your game world with this captivating tile set!

■Content

Tile sets A5 and B (each including day, evening, and night patterns, totaling 6 sheets):

Tile A5: Gravel paths, stone pavement, wooden floors, etc.
Tile B: Japanese shrines, temples, torii gates, precincts, komainu (lion-dog statues), graves, stupas, fences, lanterns, etc.

Includes day, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets.

Sample maps (project data) are included.

-------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Inspired by the ambiance of Japanese shrines and Buddhist temple surroundings, this set is designed for the "Living Good City." It's perfect for crafting horror and adventure games set in serene shrine and temple environments.

Comprising tiles A5 and B, this set also provides scene patterns for "day, evening, and night," allowing you to dynamically convey the progression of time. Unleash your creativity by crafting unique scenarios and witness diverse effects!

For an expanded worldview, seamlessly integrate this set with the previous "SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset." Moreover, it's versatile—you can utilize this set independently, even without the "SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset."
Enjoy the flexibility to shape your game world with this captivating tile set!

■Content

Tile sets A5 and B (each including day, evening, and night patterns, totaling 6 sheets):

Tile A5: Gravel paths, stone pavement, wooden floors, etc.
Tile B: Japanese shrines, temples, torii gates, precincts, komainu (lion-dog statues), graves, stupas, fences, lanterns, etc.

Includes day, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets.

Sample maps (project data) are included.
